japanese: 僕は新世界の神となる
romaji: Boku wa shin sekai no kami to naru
english: I will become the god of the new world.

anime: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Diamond is Unbreakable

japanese: おまえはもう死んでいる

romaji: Ore wa kaizoku ou ni naru!
english: I'm gonna be King of the Pirates!
I never give up, believe it!

japanese: 痛みを伴わない教訓には意味がない
romaji: Itami o tomonawanai kyoukun ni wa imi ga nai
english: A lesson without pain is meaningless.

japanese: 駆逐してやる!この世から一匹残らず!
romaji: Kuchiku shite yaru! Kono yo kara ippiki nokorazu!
english: I'll exterminate them! Every last one from this world!

japanese: 月に代わっておしおきよ!
english: In the name of the moon, I'll punish you!

japanese: 俺は趣味でヒーローをやっている者だ
romaji: Ore wa shumi de hiiroo o yatte iru mono da
english: I'm just a hero for fun.

japanese: 撃っていいのは撃たれる覚悟がある奴だけだ
romaji: Utte ii no wa uterareru kakugo ga aru yatsu dake da
english: Only those prepared to be shot should pull the trigger.
anime: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion

japanese: 世界は残酷だ…それでも美しい
romaji: Sekai wa zankoku da... soredemo utsukushii
english: This world is cruel... yet so beautiful.
